name: C L U S T E R S W E E P
name_original: C L U S T E R S W E E P
description:
Humanity is gone. All life is virtually destroyed. A single defense robot is responsible for the last form of life - a growing amoeba under siege from an aggressive and unrelentless virus. It is 1990. Welcome to Clustersweep.

Use "W/S" and "Up/Down" to control the defensive robotic arms. Destroy virii. Protect life. Regrow the world.

Keyboard:

  • W / S - Player 1 Move
  • Up / Down - Player 2 Move

-------------------------------------------------

THE INDIE GAME JAM
This game was created as part of The Indie Game Jam, presented by Schick Hydro. Hosted in partnership with Playcrafting, this groundbreaking 48-hour, indie game jam took place in New York City from November 17-19. During the jam, 20 of the rising stars of independent game development created games based on the theme of Hydro’s mission: to “protect and defend.” The games will be showcased in a custom arcade – “The Indie Game Jam Arcade” – at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles at The Game Awards 2017 on December 7th.

--------------------------------------------------
